name: Expanded Twitter
description: Twitter high resolution adaptation, wider timeline. Support main page, search page, profile page. To make the height of the tweet(which contain only 1 photo) to normal, try this script.
additional_info:
https://github.com/Boneflame/groessere-schriftgroesse/blob/master/twitter.css

2018-11-20: Add adaptation for list's timeline 2018-11-10: Support resolution above 1366x768 2018-11-27: Recommended followers will not be covered on user profile's site 2019-07-23: Adjust new twitter UI 2019-07-28: Update element name
